text.p:
WBE
ABBAT, Robert, Sr., 1763.
Established the first water supply in Preston, Lancs.
Eng., 1729 Used wooded pipes bored from tree-trunks The
Corporation fined him for supplying water on Good Friday, he
there upon did not furnish water on Sixth-Days (Fridays), claiming
that all Fridays were Good Fridays.
d 1763.
J.P. H.S. 22, p 11
The Friend Phila 99, p. 513.
